resources.string: Camera could not be opened.\nThis occurs when the camera is not available (for example it is already in use) or if the system has denied access (for example when camera access has been disabled).
In this submenu, you can take photo of your workout\nClick the button below to request the Camera permission and open a full-screen camera preview.
Camera access is required to take picture of your post workout photo.
Permission is not available. Requesting camera permission.
Camera permission is available. Starting preview.
Camera permission was granted. Starting preview.
No signal received, please wait until connected to internet
